Html:
How do you right align numeric columns?

Thanks

Hi,

Try applying the following style to your column's CellStyle property:

<Style x:Key="RightAlignCell" TargetType="{x:Type dg:DataGridCell}" >
    <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Right"/>
</Style>

Regards,
Colin E.

Thank you for ColinEber's suggestion, I try to apply the style to CellStyle and I found that if I change the Value to Center, datagrid will be display incorrectly.
So I modified you example as follow and it works for me

<Style x:Key="RightAlignCell" TargetType="{x:Type toolkit:DataGridCell}" >

Setter Property="TextBlock.TextAlignment" Value="Right"/>
</Style>
